sanskrit: """हे नारद मुने! अस्मिन संसारे सर्वातिशायी गुणवान्, बलवान्, धर्मस्य ज्ञाता, कृतज्ञ:, सत्यपालक:, दृढनिश्चयवान्, उत्तमचरित्रवान्, हितैषी, विद्वान्, कस्यापिकार्यस्य करणे समर्थ:, दर्शनीय:, धैर्यवान्, अक्रोधवान्, तेजस्वी, ईर्ष्यां च दूरे स्थापयिता, युद्धे क्रुद्धे सति देवानपि य: भयभीतं करोति तादृश: जन: कोऽस्ति?"""
english: """Who in this world lives today endowed with excellent qualities,prowess, righteousness, gratitude, truthfulness and firmness in his vows? Who is that one gifted with good conduct, given to the wellbeing of all living creatures, learned in the lore (knowledge of all things that is known), capable of doing things which others cannot do and singularly handsome? Who (among men) is self-restrained? Who has conquered anger? Who is endowed with brilliance and free from envy? Who is that when excited to wrath even the devatas, are afraid of (let alone foes)?"""
